posts.post_title: WTB T205 Hal Chase both ears showing
posts.post_content:
Would like to purchase a T205 Hal Chase in low grade condition. Raw or graded is fine. Either variation (diamond extending or ending at shoulders) will do. PM me or email me at [url]Jackwit555@gmail.com[/url]

[Edit] just purchased one and no longer am searching for this card.

Thanks, Jack
